title: Mobile Application Developers
jobDescription:
Mobile Applications are revolutionizing the communication world by enhancing the feature of the mobile as well as diversifying its purpose & usage. Currently Mobile Application Development is greatly evolved & used for various purposes. The IT - Aspirants who want to excel in the Mobile Application Development & expand their knowledge far beyond the terms of following to the arena of developing with innovation can get the best of these opportunities in Unicode Systems.

We have opened our doors for the candidates who are
  • B - Tech - IT or B - Tech - CS/ B.C.A/ M.C.A/ A level/ B level
  • Well versed with C, C++ & Java Languages
  • Have good team skills to coordinate the members of his/her team to achieve the desired goals
  • Passionate for the Mobile Application Developments
  • Have positive attitude towards his/her work driven by passion for result orientation

Unicode Systems train the juvenile Mobile Application dreamers into the mature & professional Mobile Application Developers. We provide our employees a full scope to grow, excel & develop & also encourage them to experiment & put forward the innovative ideas for the betterment. We want the IT - Aspirants who can be our assets in the Mobile Application Development.

While working with us you are going to enjoy
  • An opening that you want & deserve in Mobile Application Development
  • A full scope to grow as a Mobile Application Developer in a friendly working environment
  • The attractive compensation package
  • A firm foundation for a successful career
  • Due rewards & promotions as per your capabilities

So, if you have zeal to be a Mobile Application Developer then don't let your ideas go in vain. Come, join us & channelize your dreams into the wonder world of Mobile Applications.

title: Mobile Application Software Developer
tagsAndSkills: Application design,GIT,Architecture,Agile development,Wellness,ios development,Application software,Software solutions
jobDescription:
We are seeking a Mobile Developer to join our team of engineers in Noida. You ll have the opportunity to work on software solutions that have a huge impact on our industry and our clients. We utilize modern mobile technologies to provide world-class solutions that serve the wellness industry.

This position will be responsible for the ongoing development of our mobile app. The developer will be responsible for building cross platform app with Flutter. The ideal candidate will work well within the context of small and nimble dev teams, have the ability to communicate well with others, have a love for learning new technology and can laugh at themselves.

Key Qualifications
  • 2 years of professional software development experience (Java, Objective-C, Kotlin, Swift, Flutter, Dart)
  • Working knowledge of the general mobile landscape, architectures, trends, and emerging technologies
  • Android and/or iOS development experience with experience in Flutter strongly preferred
  • 2 years experience with Javascript (experience with a javascript framework such as Angular, React, or Vue.js preferable)
  • 2 years experience with application design/architecture
  • 2 years experience using Git
  • Experience integrating with REST APIs
  • Familiar with Agile development methodologies
  • History/knowledge of successful development mobile workflows
  • Strong critical thinking skills
  • Good communication and writing skills
  • An eye for detail and a commitment to quality work
Job Description
  • Show excellent judgement in architecting and planning applications and features at all stages of the project lifecycle.
  • Attention to detail and the ability to consistently deliver quality work
  • Take overall accountability for keeping the project clean and organized. This includes identifying next steps, clarifying unclear tickets, and breaking larger tickets into smaller and more manageable tasks.
  • Take professional accountability for getting things done and communicate clearly to team members when blockers are identified.
  • Review code carefully and provide constructive feedback to team members.
  • Responsible for keeping a production deployment path clear, and ensure that they are not a bottleneck for deployments.
  • Understand the application s architecture and anticipate the impact of new development features.
